Title: Multiverse FPS
Description: Multiverse FPS aims to add FPS (First Person Shooter/Third Person Shooter) style and functionality to the Multiverse MMO Engine.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This project modification aims to add FPS (First Person Shooter/Third Person Shooter) style and functionality to the Multiverse MMO Engine.

 

v1.0 Features/Changes [To be released]:

- Mousegrab (Mouse Look) functionality. Player no longer needs to drag to control camera view.
[Contributed by oldschool]


Additional information on this project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
